title: Why does no one watch League Streams on Mixer, as Opposed to Twitch?
body: I was checking out Mixer today and looking at the League streamers, and I was shook. There was only like 300 TOTAL viewers on Mixer watching League, as opposed to 70,000 on Twitch!? That is a HUGE difference! Why does no one watch Mixer League streamers out of curiosity?
